name: hauk
description: Hauk is a self-hosted real-time location sharing app. It lets users share live location via temporary links without third-party tracking, suitable for safety or coordination during travel.

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Share your live location with friends or family through temporary, secure links

features.title: Temporary Links
features.description: Generate time-limited sharing links that automatically expire after a set duration

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: No third-party tracking or data collection, all location data stays on your server

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Native mobile app for easy location sharing from your smartphone

features.title: Map Display
features.description: View shared locations on interactive maps with real-time position updates

features.title: Group Sharing
features.description: Share location with multiple people simultaneously for coordinated activities

features.title: Safety Feature
features.description: Ideal for travel safety, letting trusted contacts know your whereabouts

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete ownership of location data without relying on commercial services
